ref.mixed-citation: Pascual-Alayón P, Sancho A, Hernández E, Santamaría MTG, Duque V, Balguerías E et al. Reproductive aspects of sardine (Sardina pilchardus Walbaum, 1792), round sardinella (Sardinella aurita Valenciennes, 1847), flat sardinella (Sardinella maderensis Lowe, 1838) and mackerel (Scomber colias Gmelin, 1789) off Mauritanian waters, Northwest Africa. In S. Garcia, M. Tandstad and A.M. Caramelo Editors. Science and Management of Small Pelagics. Symposium on Science and the Challenge of Managing Small Pelagic Fisheries on Shared Stocks in Northwest Africa. 2012 Available: ftp://ftp.fao.org/fi/Cdrom/P18_CDROM/root%5Cnew%5CSYMPOSIUM_PART2THEME1-POSTERSPAPERS/P1.3_PASCUAL-ALAYON.pdf
